data.description: Producing Internet television and video (which encompasses a wide range of media content, from expensive Netflix and Amazon shows to low-budget YouTube channels). With its focus on "producing" and the role of the producer, combines the hands-on production work of writing, shooting, and editing videos with an emphasis on entrepreneurship and the innovation of sustainable business models.
data.title: PRODUCING FOR INTERNET TV AND VIDEO

data.description: Teaches the skills needed to produce, engage with, and understand new and emerging technologies within the context of communication and creative expression. Become a more critical consumer and producer of digital media.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO DIGITAL MEDIA PRODUCTION

data.description: Theory and practice of media production and screenwriting.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO MEDIA PRODUCTION
